---
title: "Blog"
listing:
  contents: 
    - 'posts/*/*_post.qmd'
    - 'posts/*/*_post.ipynb'
  feed: true
  sort: 
    - "date desc"
    - "title desc"
  type: default
  image-height: 130px
  image-placeholder: "profile.jpg"
  fields: [image, title, description, date, reading-time]
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  page-size: 9
  date-format: iso
  id: blog-listings
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
---
